Signature; Inscription; Date; Title

medium: Pen, brush, black ink and grey wash
signed: Verso (on board) : [José luis Cuevas]; Inscribed R in black ink: [autoretrato de niño]; LR in black ink: [Hotel Emperatriz./Madrid./MAYO 1963]; Verso top black ink: [José luis Cuevas \'autoretrato como niño/ Madrid/ MAYO-1963].
title: Self-Portrait as a Child
